title: Fragment, 1701–50
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet)
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Fragment of uncut velvet on silk ground. Originally tomato-red, now faded almost brown on face of fabric. Design in center of scrolling foliage and blossoms with ground in small zigzags, all uncut pile.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 1701–50.
1701–50. Medium: silk
Technique: uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet). Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1921-22-25-a,b.
